First time reading this. Surprised to see an NTR story that ends with Vanilla. (I've read mangas/visual novels that started as NTR that turns to Vanilla before, but it's pretty rare) The story is interesting too. It was scary at first because it reminded me of a certain horror movie but it slowly started to become Vanilla. The pacing is nice. Overall, I like it.
Lol it would really suck if the entire class start to fuck and you didnt get a partner
This it is a work in another level, truly it is.

What the parents did really annoyed the shit out of me. I'm not a real big fan of the "Redemption = Death" trope, but it can be good when used well. It was *not* used well here. If they wanted real redemption, then they'd have stayed alive and tried to help their daughters heal from the unholy hell they foisted on them in the village, not run away like cowards via death.

Cuck will be pissed seeing this kind of story.

1st: mc and heroine/s were happy at the end but bad guy/s did not die. 
2nd: mc and heroine/s had a happy ending plus bad guy/s died
